formatted_address: 70 Compassvale Bow, #01-44 Sengkang Grand Mall, Singapore 544692
name: Watsons Singapore - Sengkang Grand Mall (Click & Collect)

reviews.text: I encountered an issue with a product, and the Manager named Suzette was very efficient in resolving it. She listened to my concerns and found a solution quickly . Great problem solving skills and first class customer care! Well done!

I like the spacious and cleanliness of this Watsons outlet at Sengkang Grand Mall.  It is on top of Buangkok Mrt. I have been here a few times and the staff here are courteous and professional.

The cons is despite of such big space, is a pity that this outlet has limited range of goods. There are many residential area around so the demand is high.

I would like to compliment Nabilah, the Store Supervisor, when I visited the store on 14 Oct. Nabilah is friendly and professional.  She patiently guided me on how to use the stamps collection to enjoy greater promotions.  Thank you for the wonderful customer service.

Didn’t have a good experience with the cashier Hafiz, he “looks” friendly but words coming out from his mouth are quite rude, slow in processing the items too. He needs to be send back for customer service training.
I went there to buy 3 bottles of hand soap. It took really long for me to login to the website, but luckily a young lady at the cashier assisted me with patience. The service is a 10/10.
